news.title: Russia is blocking WhatsApp to push ‘surveillance’ app, company says
news.titleOriginal: Russia is blocking WhatsApp to push ‘surveillance’ app, company says
news.summary: Russian news outlets reported on Wednesday that WhatsApp’s domain had been completely blocked and was inaccessible without a VPN or another workaround

news.title: Crypto lender halted withdrawals during Bitcoin's fall last week
